Your Next Dream Home

We are a Space real estate agency who knows the galaxy, the market, and the process. We can advise you when to think on it, sleep on it, or go all in. Because this is about much more than bricks and sticks. This is about your future home in outer space. You don't want to just live in it. You want to love it.

Exotic Locations

The "Face on Mars," Cydonia lies in the planet's northern hemisphere in a transitional zone between the heavily cratered regions to the south and smooth plains to the north. Some planetologists believe that the northern areas may once have been ocean beds and that Cydonia may once have been a coastal zone!
